US working to bridge gaps on Gaza hostage deal, says BlinkenThe United States is working intensively with Israel and intermediaries Qatar and Egypt to bridge remaining gaps for a hostage deal that would see a pause in fighting between Israel and Hamas, U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken said on Friday. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 15:52:02 GMT HLMUV6NDXRK3JKRKQB5U2XO2HA https://www.reuters.com/world/us-working-bridge-gaps-gaza-hostage-deal-says-blinking-2024-03-15/Humeyra Pamuk世界
World Court to hear Nicaragua-Germany dispute over Israel aid in AprilThe International Court of Justice on Friday said it would hold hearings on April 8 and 9 in Nicaragua's case against Germany for giving military aid to Israel and defunding the U.N. Palestinian refugee agency (UNRWA). Fri, 15 Mar 2024 15:42:34 GMT EWJZLYLUYFNPJOKBIYLUH2VFVU https://www.reuters.com/world/world-court-hear-nicaragua-germany-dispute-over-israeli-aid-april-2024-03-15/Reuters世界
Congo lifts moratorium on death penalty, justice ministry circular showsDemocratic Republic Congo has lifted a moratorium on the death penalty, citing treachery and espionage in recurring armed conflicts as the reason for allowing a resumption of executions, said a justice ministry circular seen by Reuters on Friday. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 15:38:48 GMT 2WJYNRM5WRPF3FZUX5X2YQ3WSE https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congo-lifts-death-penalty-moratorium-justice-ministry-circular-shows-2024-03-15/Reuters世界非洲
Iran Air could be banned from Europe if Tehran sends missiles to Russia, US warnsG7 nations are prepared to respond with severe new penalties that could include a ban on Iran Air flights to Europe if Iran proceeds with the transfer of close-range ballistic missiles to Russia, a senior U.S. official said on Friday. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 15:20:40 GMT LLCCWTHZEVM5TNLWDY5LEPNPZE https://www.reuters.com/world/iran-air-could-be-banned-europe-if-tehran-sends-missiles-Russia-warns-us-2024-03-15/Steve Holland世界
Putin says Ukraine will be punished for election day attacks on civiliansPresident Vladimir Putin said on Friday that Ukraine would be punished for trying to disrupt the Russian presidential election by shelling civilian targets in Russian territory and using 2,500 armed soldiers to try to pierce Russia's borders. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 15:19:26 GMT UFWO4U5YIJLNZM7K5FGRA5TKJE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-says-ukraine-will-be-punished-for-election-day-attacks-on-civilians-2024-03-15/Reuters世界欧洲
G7 warns Iran not to give Russia ballistic missiles for Ukraine warThe Group of Seven (G7) industrialised powers told Iran on Friday not to transfer ballistic missiles to Russia to use in its conflict with Ukraine, warning that they would take action against Tehran if it did so. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 15:12:42 GMT 5NQS4B4EXRIUDKFOJC73显示器https://www.reuters.com/world/g7-warns-iran-not-to-give-Russia-ballistic-missiles-ukraine-war-2024-03-15/Angelo Amante世界
North Korean defectors seek more U.N. monitoring of abusesNorth Koreans defectors spoke at a U.N. event in Geneva on Friday to expose human rights violations in a country one of them described as "hell" and to advocate for a strengthened U.N. mandate to investigate and document them. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 15:11:00 GMT M4XDUJFKVBI2VIMM5YT3SRINH4 https://www.reuters.com/world/north-korean-defectors-seek-more-un-monitoring-abuses-2024-03-15/Emma Farge, Cecile Mantovani世界
EU set to agree new Russia sanctions over Navalny's deathThe European Union is set to agree sanctions on several people seen as involved in the mistreatment and death of Kremlin critic Alexei Navalny in an Arctic penal colony, three diplomats said on Friday. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 14:53:46 GMT EFLGVEYNFVLVDLGSGHMEM4ARBM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-sets-agree-new-Russia-sanctions-over-navalnys-death-2024-03-15/Reuters世界欧洲
Biden denounces resurgence of Islamophobia amid Gaza warU.S. President Joe Biden condemned on Friday what he called an ugly resurgence of Islamophobia since the Oct. 7 start of the Israel-Gaza war. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 14:41:15 GMT EPFMKKZKVVKR5PZTUJKXQRFCKI https://www.reuters.com/world/us/biden-denounces-resurgence-of-islamophobia-amid-gaza-war-2024-03-15/Kanishka Singh世界美国
Hamas lashes out at Abbas's 'unilateral' designation of new PMThe Islamist group Hamas on Friday criticized the "unilateral" designation by Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas of an ally and leading business figure as prime minister with a mandate to help reform the Palestinian Authority (PA) and rebuild Gaza. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 14:26:50 GMT 3TONQ2G5JLZBBA2Z2JQMTTBVA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hamas-lashes-out-abbas-uniside-designation-new-pm-2024-03-15/Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东地区
Israeli military says troops did not open fire on Gazans waiting for aidIsrael's military said armed Palestinians had opened fire while crowds were waiting for aid trucks in the northern Gaza Strip and denied soldiers fired at the convoy, defending its actions in an incident on Thursday in which Gaza officials said 21 people were killed. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 14:15:37 GMT EJQXYKSLO5MWLJNE4I2ZBRD7II https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-military-says-troops-did-not-open-fire-gazans-waiting-aid-2024-03-15/Reuters世界中东地区
